KLAPP-B.IC.summary: Klappir GrÃ¦nar Lausnir hf develops, sells, and implements software solutions in the environmental field. The company offers software tools for companies, municipalities, and governments to set a measurable goal to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and inform about the performance. Its software conveys environmental information and makes environmental analysis for companies in various sectors; and supports the legal consequences ships against the international law, as well as keeps track of the operation of vehicles, and manages a fleet of cars and vehicles. The company is based in Reykjavik, Iceland.
